data.actual_result: It will do a weird slide animation.
data.expected_result: It should not do anything since you dont have access to it.
data.short_description: If someone mentions a channel that they have access to and someone who doesn't, is clicking it, it will form a weird slide animation.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make someone that has access to a channel that you dont have access to send the # for it (Example #Mod-Chat) - -Click on the #Mod-Chat
